wikipedia_page.main: Matthew Puffett, known by the stage name Future Beat Alliance, is an English electronica musician and producer. He started producing music in 1996 by releasing it through Void Records.

response: * Tresor 237: Future Beat Alliance – Machines Can Help EP (12")
* Tresor 242: Future Beat Alliance – Grey Summer (12")
A follow-up, Heavy Drug (Surrender Sounds Mix): The Remixes, was released on 27 December 2009, with remixes from King Unique, Steve Mac and Future Beat Alliance.
! scope="row"| "Inside" (Future Beat Alliance Remix)(featuring Grant Nicholas)

On  a single, "Heavy Drug (Surrender Sounds Mix)", was made available digitally via Beatport and iTunes. On  the download was followed by a remix EP with remixes by King Unique, Steve Mac and Future Beat Alliance.
